txt.en: Quickbeam can be found in Derndingle in south-eastern Fangorn Forest.\n\nYou have delivered the lost Huorns to safety at Quickbeam's side in Derndingle. You should speak to Quickbeam.
Derndingle can be found in south-eastern Fangorn Forest.\n\nYou have gathered as many young Huorns as you could find, and should now return to Derndingle.

'Hoom. You have done well to bring these young ones to me, [placeholder]....

'I shall look after them, for such a role is not new to me... hum, or any Ent for that matter.

'Thank you, little one.'
Young Huorns have become lost in Fangorn Forest and must be tended by Quickbeam if they are to survive.
Found lost Huorns in Fangorn Forest ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find lost Huorns in Fangorn Forest ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

You have encountered a young Huorn, and your companion swiftly shuffles to its side, as if to defend it. You cannot quite tell, but Quickbeam's Huorn appears upset that it has been left to fend for itself in this empty, dangerous forest.\n\nYou should continue your search for other lost Huorns and then bring them to safety in Derndingle.
Bring the lost Huorns to Derndingle
Lost Huorns can be found throughout southern Fangorn Forest.\n\nQuickbeam's Huorn wants you to help search for young Huorns in Fangorn Forest.
